text:
35 has never looked so good! Nikki & Brie Bella celebrate their birthday on Nov. 21, and we’re having a celebration of our own with their all-time hottest photos.

Nikki Bella & Brie Bella are the ultimate dynamic duo. The twin sisters are WWE superstars, but when they’re not in the ring, they’re still commanding attention with their undeniable sex appeal. The two brunette goddesses have it all: perfectly toned bodies, stunning faces, and gorgeous long locks. These ladies don’t only kick butt in the WWE ring, but IRL too! Join us in taking a look at all of the twin’s hottest photos to date.

Nikki posted a snap on Nov. 7 that had our hearts beating a little faster. The wrestler posed in just a bra top and tight leather boy shorts for her 8 million followers, and she was looking hotter than ever! The star’s red bra read “Fearless Nicki,” across the front, and the steamy photo proved how fearless she really was. Beneath her leather boy shorts, Nikki wore a pair a fishnet tights, only adding to the sex appeal of the photo. There was plenty of skin to be seen in the snapshot, and her 6 pack abs were on full display. Nikki – please teach us your workout regimen!

Just like her sister, Brie is F-L-A-W-L-E-S-S and her Oct. 28 Instagram was picture proof. Brie was looking red hot in a latex outfit that clung to her every curve. The siren matched her red ensemble with a red pout, and she was looking confident as ever. Brie used the post as a platform to share an inspirational message as well! “Words can’t describe how special today is. The first EVER all women’s WWE ppv, Evolution. I’ve been lucky enough to see the women of the past and the present fight for today. To be at the forefront of this powerful revolution taught me one thing…..you can’t do it alone, it takes the whole village,” she wrote beneath the pic.

These two ladies always look sexy as hell, but together, they’re unstoppable. Click through the gallery above to see all of their hottest photos to date!
title: Happy Birthday Nikki & Brie Bella: See The Twins’ Hottest Photos
